meanings.definition: The quality of being far-sighted or having good judgment.
meanings.sent1: Her longheadedness in planning for the future helped her avoid many problems.
meanings.sent2: His longheadedness in financial matters allowed him to save for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: Despite his longheadedness, he still forgot his keys every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her longheadedness was like a lighthouse guiding others through stormy seas.
meanings.sent5: The longheadedness of the wise owl was admired by all the forest animals.

meanings.definition: The state of being intelligent or wise in decision-making.
meanings.sent1: The professor's longheadedness in solving complex problems was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: Her longheadedness in negotiations always led to successful outcomes.
meanings.sent3: His longheadedness in choosing ice cream flavors made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The longheadedness of the old tree in adapting to changing weather amazed the botanists.
meanings.sent5: The longheadedness of the chess master was evident in every move he made.
